column4: my mouse keeps freezing every 1-5 seconds for anywhere from 3 to 10 seconds.... does this for a while (say 5 minutes)... then wont do it for a while.... When it does happen, keyboard is still responsive. this is not a new installation and I haven't had this problem before maybe 2 days ago. Thoughts?
Sounds like a problem with the mouse itself; good thinh they're inexpensive.
You might also try swapping usb devices into different ports.
first step before I got on irc
